A good and solid team oriented FPS in survival horror style. This is one of those games where playing with friends can be so fun. Even with randoms there is a good sense of comradery as you battle wave after wave of zeds. Having a break inbetween waves to buy guns and ammo is great - if you can get there in time. Some of the maps are very decent and there is a great deal of modded maps and servers.

A huge amount of dlc available too - my advice would be to grab a huge bundle when on special. Enjoy all the extra skins and weapons!
if you like fps and shooting zombies than this is the game for you great game 10/10

A game like Killing Floor doesn't come by very often. The magic to the success of this game really comes from the simple yet brilliant mechanics such as the slow motion feature. I have probably spent almost as much time in this game as Civ V which says a lot. 9.5/10 I seriously reccomend this game.

Imagina que estás en un mundo de mujeres odiosas. Todas te detestan, todas te quieren decapitar porque no les respondes el teléfono. Algunas te escupen en la cara, otras caminan sin rumbo buscando a su príncipe azul, pero la mayor de las amenazas será enfrentarte a una mujer que no se maquilla.

Mi consejo... cuídense las espaldas, nunca te alejes de tus amigos, apunta siempre hacia la cabeza, comparte tus ganancias con los que vienen recién llegando. Nadie nace preparado para enfrentar la locura femenina.


A mí me gustan grandes, ¿a ti no?

If you enjoy a good zombie romp, and I know I certainly do, this might be the game for you. Featuring a bunch of different zed types, and a tonne of weapons, each tailored to suit one of seven classes, you'll have a fun and varied experience trying out different play styles. The shooting is solid, but the hitboxes are slightly iffy and the models and animations are pretty old school, but it's a modestly priced title, so that is to be expected. That said, this is one for the whole family, and some friends as well, because in co-op, it's awesome.
Good surviving game if you work in team
ЧЁткая игра

It's ok. I never really got hooked on it, the upgrade and buy system is pretty clunky but it's a decent game if you want to play some co op with friends. Very much like 'survival' mode on left4dead but with poorer graphics and gameplay.
Get it and you will never leave your computer. Once you start leveling, you will not stop untill your eyes bleed and your back hurts. Really. This game is super addictive and you ned to try it.

Almost no other FPS makes it feel this good to use a gun. Simple and Expandable. Unreal Engine. Reliable multiplayer and developers. CoD zombies minus the shame and shunning you revieve on steam from Playing Call of Duty. Massive mod support. Game replayability varies from player to player but if it hits your sweet spot with it's gun mechanics and lack of the padding/pretentiousness other games have these days, you won't get rid of it so easily. Only minus is the abundance of DLC. Some may call it a scam; others an expansion pack. Remember when they were called those? Killing Floor is definitely a revival of early 2000s mechanics... But thanks to the active developers and community is still kicking unlike other "dated" FPSers.
Endless amount of fun and replayability (not even a word)

This game is an absolute blast with friends and a must have if you like cooperative first person shooters. You need to survive waves of incoming mutants until the boss arrives, during the waves the player will recieve money in order to buy equipement and weapons. There are various classes to choose from which all offer different weapons and gameplay styles. All the weapons feel satisfying and pack quite a punch. There are tons of map to choose from and even a new objective mode. 

Overall the gameplay is just so satisfying and amazing with friends, despite the somewhat dated graphics.
Buy this game... I mean, BUY THIS FUCKING GAME

Killing Floor! A game about team work, freindship, anoying characters aaand....Wait, what am I forgeting? Anywho, you and your team are put in front of thousands of scientifical abominations ready to eat your sweet english buns for second breakfast! Therefore! You and your team-KILLING! Ah, now I remember! You kill in this game! How silly of me to forget that intricate detail! Now that you have been fully persuaded, don't just sit there! Just sit there and buy the game! Oh and don't forget to tell your alienated friends as well! Good killing to you and kin!
Awesome and really fun!

Я бы назвал эту игру модом к Left 4 Dead, с более заниженной графикой, большим количеством перков персонажей и различными  видами зомби(в праздничных обновлениях). Смысл игры почти тот же, в Left 4 Dead нужно добежать до укрытия, в Killing Floor нужно пережить определенное количество волн, на последней волне убить босса.

Jogo com graficos bem bons que rodam em computadores sem muita configuração boa, com uma jogabilidade boa e variedade de armas e de personagens. Recomendo para comprar se estiver na promoção, pois ainda não é um jogo que valha 25 reais na minha opinião.

Immerse yourself in the world of Killing Floor, enjoy slaughtering waves of zombies in a dark and twisted atmoshpere that each map delivers in a unique way. Level up your character and particpate in harder difficulties and enjoy the wide selection of weapons at your finger tips.

J'adore !!! Surement l'un des meilleurs jeu de zombies que j'aie jamais joué. C'est un jeu de zombie qui fonctionne par vague et nous devons abbatres le nombre de zombie inscrit. La marchande ouvre entre les vagues. Mais le but premier est de battre le "boss" de la fin le Patriarche ! Une bonne variété de zombies nous sont offert et surtout les voix son en français !

It's hectic, clustered, and filled with a dozen roles for how you want to squash bloodied freaks of nature.  The art design is a bit lacking: the music is mostly the same generic metal riff over and over, guns are mostly real-world rifles (with a few token steampunk and golden weapons), settings create a drab and dreary oppressive tone but  the layout works against both players and enemies alike.

If you want a quick stomp with no context or reason other than "survive" then you'll have fun here.  There's a lot of blasty "unf" behind some of the combat.  But if you're looking for something with a bit more refinement you probably don't want a zombie game to being with.
Great game and even better with friends

It doesnt matter how old this game gets its always brilliant fun, purely because its so hilarious to play! theres nothing like walling yourself into a room with two friends holding the doors while you all reload and pray the horde doesnt take you alive!!!

The seasonal events are fun too..fighting santa on killing floor is something i will never forget - that guy was a killer :| !!! 

Overall i love killing floor however i wish the pistols packed more of a punch..im a lover of pistols however in the later levels i am always slaughtered because i just cant damage anything quick enough :( !!

a definite MUST have for your collection !

Hello chaps this is a great game if you love zombie survivalist type games you dont build and dont find zombies... there mutants but I reccomend this game for that person out there that just loves shooting things like zombies and other such animals or mutants. But there are some cheap points at it like the skins, the dlc skins dont do anything but too be honest the camo ones are cool but the gold ones are really stupid. if your going to get a dlc i would start with the one with the tommy gun in it its really fun to use and the scythe is pretty awesome. enjoy the game if you get it after all :) also dont get to many addons most of them dont work anyway also it might slow down your computer download time for server and lag you or screw up your fps ENJOY :D

It's like TF2 in the sense that it's addicting, but better than TF2 in the sense that it doesn't drain your wallet as much.
Blowing zombies up, slicing giant chainsaw surgeons to death with a katana, blowing bullets into brains, and fire. 
It has a freakin' flare revolver. And grenade launchers.
Fun to play with. Not to eat.
